member.name: M:Task1.StringHelper.GetVowelCount(System.String)
member.summary: This method return the number (count) of vowels in the given string.
member.param: The input string will only consist of lower case letters and/or spaces.
member.exception: The input string cannot be null.
The input string cannot be empty.
